channel.title: Tutorials on Pratheepa Jeganathan
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorials on Pratheepa Jeganathan

item.title: BAyesian Reduction in Background Interference
item.description: In this tutorial, I’ll demonstrate how to use BARBI for removing contaminants in low-biomass samples (metagenomics NGS data of cell-free DNA):

item.title: Beta Binomial Distribution
item.description: The Beta Binomial Distribution implemented in corncob package.

item.title: Empirical saddlepoint approximation for smoothing survival functions under right-censored data
item.description: In this tutorial, I’ll demonstrate how to use ESPA for smoothing Kaplan Meier Estimator:

item.title: Saddelpoint-based bootstrap (SPBB) inference for spatial regression models
item.description: In this tutorial, I’ll demonstrate how to use SPBBspatial for making inferences on spatial depndence parameter in the spatial regression models:

item.title: Block bootstrap method for longitudinal microbiome data
item.description: In this tutorial, I’ll demonstrate how to use bootLong for making inferences on longitudinal microbiome data.
